Class BookRepository

java.lang.Object
persistence.BookRepository
public class BookRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing Book entities in temporary storage.

Provides methods to add, remove, retrieve, and search for books. This implementation uses a static ArrayList to store all book instances during runtime.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookRepository()
    Creates a new BookRepository with empty in-memory storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookRepository

      public BookRepository()
      Creates a new BookRepository with empty in-memory storage.

  • Method Details

    • setSearchStrategy

      public void setSearchStrategy(BookSearchStrategy searchStrategy)
      Sets the search strategy for the repository.

      This allows changing the behavior of the search method dynamically.

      Parameters:
      searchStrategy - the search strategy to use for book searches

    • search

      public List<Book> search(String keyword)
      Searches the repository for books matching the given keyword using the currently set search strategy.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for (e.g., part of title, author, or ISBN)
      Returns:
      a list of books matching the keyword; empty if no books match
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no search strategy has been set

    • addBook

      public static void addBook(Book book)
      Adds a new book to the repository.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book object to add

    • getBooks

      public static ArrayList<Book> getBooks()
      Returns the internal list reference of books (mutable). Prefer findAll() for an immutable snapshot.
      Returns:
      the current internal books list (mutable reference)

    • setBooks

      public static void setBooks(ArrayList<Book> books)
      Replaces the internal books list with the provided list reference.
      Parameters:
      books - the new list reference to use as storage (must not be null)

    • removeBook

      public static void removeBook(Book book)
      Removes a book from the repository.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book object to remove

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Returns all books currently in the repository.
      Returns:
      a list of all Book objects

    • searchBook

      public static Book searchBook(String keyword)
      Searches for the first book by a keyword across title, author, or ISBN.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword
      Returns:
      the first matching book or null if none found

    • findBookByIsbn

      public static Book findBookByIsbn(String isbn)
      Finds a book by exact ISBN match.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN value to find
      Returns:
      the matching book or null if not found

    • clearBooks

      public static void clearBooks()
      Clears all books in the repository (useful for tests).

    • findAll

      public static List<Book> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all books stored in the repository.
      Returns:
      a new list copy containing all books

    • findAllBorrowed

      public static List<Book> findAllBorrowed()
      Returns all books currently marked as borrowed.
      Returns:
      list of borrowed books
